alert.note: Alert for Borden; Howard; Mitchell; Scurry (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 3:28AM CDT until July 16 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mitchell County in western Texas... Scurry County in western Texas... Southern Borden County in western Texas... Howard County in western Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 327 AM CDT, severe outflow located near Gail, Snyder, and Big Spring moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Fluvanna mesonet measured 61 mpg gust. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Big Spring, Snyder, Colorado City, Coahoma, Loraine, Forsan, Sand Springs, Lake Colorado City, Lake Colorado City State Park, Inadale, Luther, Colorado City Airport, J B Thomas Reservoir, Champion Creek Reservoir, Westbrook, Cuthbert, Dunn, Big Spring McMahon-Wrinkle Airpark, Vealmoor and Elbow. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 173 and 228. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
